description: Conversational wizard and prompts generator with zero dependencies.
name: wizardy

scripts.changelog:commit: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "docs: updated CHANGELOG.md"
scripts.fix: yarn fix:other && yarn fix:js && yarn fix:ts
scripts.lint: yarn lint:types && yarn lint:js && yarn lint:other && yarn lint:ts
scripts.postversion: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.preversion: git pull && yarn && yarn test && yarn dist
scripts.release:major: generate-changelog -M -x "chore,docs,refactor,style,test" && yarn changelog:commit && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: generate-changelog -m -x "chore,docs,refactor,style,test" && yarn changelog:commit && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: generate-changelog -p -x "chore,docs,refactor,style,test" && yarn changelog:commit && npm version patch
